title: Cold Snap Update Goes Live!
summary: The winter-themed Cold Snap update is here with new map conditions, events, and massive QoL improvements.
fullContent:
Cold Snap Update Highlights

The long-awaited Cold Snap season is live!

  • New Cold Snap map condition with blizzards and freezing
  • Flickering Flames event
  • Free 'Goalie' Raider Deck on Dec 26
  • Skill tree resets now available (2k Coins per point)
  • ADS toggle, Cred cap shown, and tons of weapon buffs

Check the official notes for all 100+ fixes.

title: Arc Raiders Launch Day Hotfixes
summary: Day-one stability and performance improvements rolled out shortly after launch.
fullContent: Quick hotfixes addressed initial stability issues, connection problems, and minor bugs to ensure a smooth launch experience.
